title: Correct Login Credentials Not Working
body:
I have used the same account since release and was able to login just fine 4 days ago. Now the launcher is unable to accept my username, password and region combination. All of these are correct. I ran the hextech repair tool and conducted various network troubleshooting tests via the League of Legends support page --- none of these are working. All other games work just fine.

I submitted a ticket and this still has not been resolved / responded to.

Ticket: #30296081    (Includes Logs)

NOTE: The account I am posting from is my alt account. My main account can't log into the launcher OR the website -- both with correct credentials.

Please assist.

replies.body: Hey, I took a look into your account and saw some really odd activity, so I placed a security lock on it just to be extra safe.  Your ticket has been received, and an account recovery specialist will be reaching out as soon as they can.  I don't see anything damaging so not to worry, but I highly recommend going over our [account protection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) just to double up on your security inside and out of league.  We'll see you in your ticket!
Thanks for confirming the lock Porocles. Do you have an ETA on the specialist reaching out? Would really like to get this unlocked ASAP. Thanks
Happy to help!  {{summoner:31}} I've checked with the account team and there's a higher volume right now.  You already submitted a ticket yesterday though, so a response won't be too far off.

Porocles -- do these recovery representatives work into the evening? It is 5:30pm central but I am hoping to have this resolved in the next few hours. Any ideas here? Ability to expedite the resolution?
Yeah, we'll be around.  Tickets are first come first serve, just hang tight friend.

Hey Porocles,

Can you look at the status of my ticket please. I received a response from LoveSickCommander but it only says the following:

"Looks like we're helping you out on ticket #30296075

Please forward all your questions and concerns over there, please!"

The problem is I can't view my ticket because my log in credentials do not work on the League of Legends website. I need to complete the verification process via my main accounts email address or I need someone with Riot to give me access to the League of Legends website to view my ticket.

I have told LoveSickCommander this several times today, but this has been their only response.

Please assist!
It looks like a specialist replied to your ticket that you do have access to just a few minutes ago with some follow-up questions.  Give him a reply back and you should be set!

Thanks for the fast responses Porocles.

I answered the questions a few hours ago but still no reply.

Account is still locked.
